In 2020 , there were over 35 million people in the U.S. who reported being physically assaulted or sexually assaulted by an intimate partner in their lifetime . In 1993 , this number was at about 24 million . This statistic illustrates the number of people in the U.S. who reported being physically assaulted or sexually assaulted by an intimate partner in their lifetime between 1993 and 2020 .
According to a global survey conducted by Ipsos in 2021 , 44 percent of respondents said that they were very likely to use the voice assistant on their phone .

This statistic shows the distribution of mobile data consumption in the European Union ( EU-28 ) from the fourth quarter of 2015 to the second quarter of 2018 , by connection type . In the second quarter of 2018 , the share of mobile data usage via LTE connection was 52 percent .

This statistic shows the number of cases ( including deaths ) of COVID-19 coronavirus infections in the United States , from the first confirmed case of infections on January 21, 2020 , until March 13 , 2020 . As of 24 March , there were more than 300,000 COVID-19 coronavirus cases in the U.S.

This statistic depicts the average daily caloric intake among adults in the United States in 2013 , sorted by gender . In 2013 , the average daily caloric intake of females amounted to approximately 2,200 calories , while that of males was about 2,800 calories .

This statistic shows the effect the coronavirus outbreak in Italy would have on the sales of selected products , as of March 2020 . During the survey , 56 percent of the respondents stated to expect a decrease in the sales of food .

This statistic shows the average monthly household water consumption in England from 2010/11 to 2019/20 ( in cubic meters per household ) . In the fiscal year 2019/2020 , the annual average monthly household consumption of water was 138 cubic meters .

This statistic shows the number of travel visits from Canada to the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020 , by purpose of visit . In 2020 , there were 1.68 million visits made by people from Canada to the United Kingdom on holiday .

This statistic depicts the opinion of British consumers on how the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) crisis will affect their holiday plans in 2020 . Of the respondents , 36 percent of the people surveyed stated that they had cancelled or postponed their holidays due to the coronavirus outbreak .

The statistic shows how the number of exports from Switzerland was distributed across the exported goods , based on the value of exports ; in other words , the share of exports from Switzerland in the total number of exports from all countries . In 2012 , the export value of goods from Switzerland was around 131.57 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic presents the annual production value for the manufacture of solar photovoltaics in Italy from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , the solar photovoltaics production value came to approximately 3.3 billion euros .

This statistic shows the share of consumers who would be willing to pay a premium of 20 U.S. dollars for a product that was labeled as being free of genetically modified organisms ( GMOs ) . During an August 2013 survey , 54 percent of respondents said that they would pay the premium for GMO-free food products .
In 2021 , the number of passengers on the international flights in Poland was 11.7 million .

In 2019 , the publishing industry in France employed 44,660 individuals . The publishing industry in France is made up of several sub sectors . The publishing industry in France employed 19,604 people in 2019 .

As of May 14 , 2020 , over 11.25 billion euros had been invested in 25 venture-backed companies that have received investments from the European Innovation Council ( EIC ) . The EIC is a new initiative by the European Commission aimed to support innovative companies .
The statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Iraq from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average life expectancy at birth in Iraq was 72.6 years .
Direct employment in the mining and quarrying sector in Italy from 2011 to 2018 amounted to 158,987 people . Direct employment in this sector has steadily increased over this period .

This statistic displays the number of enterprises with an annual turnover of more than 10 million euro in the construction industry in Italy from 2014 to 2016 . The data is broken down by size class . In 2016 , there were approximately 5.4 thousand enterprises in Italy with an annual turnover of more than 10 million euros .
The number of people employed in Belgium decreased over the past years , from 2009 to 2021 . The number of people employed in Belgium peaked in 2010 , with 3.9 million people employed in that year .

This statistic illustrates the distribution of the number of people who flee their countries in 2018 by the reason why they flee as of 2018 . It can be seen that the main reason for refugees to flee their own country was to escape persecution , accounting for 28 percent of the total number of refugee arrivals in 2018 .

This statistic shows the share of respondents who use the following apps for their online shopping in 2020 . During the survey , it was found that 54 percent of respondents use Amazon as a shopping app .

This statistic shows business confidence in the global financial industry in 2013 , by region . It was found that 36.5 percent of respondents felt optimistic regarding the financial industrys outlook for 2013 .

This statistic shows the share of global internet searches on Google for the keyword '' coronavirus 2020 '' from January 28 to February 13 , 2020 . In the reported period , 44 percent of all Google searches related to the novel coronavirus were from outside China .

In 2020 , the average attendance of the English Premier League was 36,375 spectators per game . The average attendance of the Premier League has fluctuated over the last decade , with the 2015/16 season seeing an average attendance of 37,507 per match .

This statistic displays the consumption of heart and heat healthy diets among adults in the United States from 2008 to 2012 , by gender . In 2012 , 21 percent of men consumed a heart healthy diet , compared to 33 percent of women .

According to a 2021 survey , 52 per cent of respondents from France and Germany were of the opinion that AI would bring benefits and 38 percent feared it could cause harm . In the U.K. , more people feared AI would cause harm , with 43 percent .

This statistic shows the distribution of global smartphone sales from 2010 to 2015 , broken down by operating system . In 2010 , approximately 40 percent of smartphone sales worldwide were based on Android , and only two percent were based on Apple 's iOS system . By the following year , Android smartphones accounted for more than 60 percent of global shipments . As of the third quarter of 2015 , approximately 80 percent of global smartphone sales were based on Android , while only 20 percent were based on Apple 's iOS platform .

This statistic shows the average price per week of a standard room in a three-star hotel in Rome in the first six months of 2016 . In the period under review , the price varied between 99 and 128 euros . In the same period , the average price per week in a five-star hotel in Rome was 205 euros .

This statistic shows the projected gross domestic product ( GDP ) of Poland in 2019 , 2020 , 2021 and 2022 , with projections up until 2026 . In 2019 , Poland 's GDP amounted to approximately 1.12 trillion U.S. dollars .

Natural gas consumption in the United Kingdom ( UK ) has increased by 1.2 TWh ( terawatt-hours ) from 2020 to 2021 . This is the highest level of natural gas consumption since 2007 . In 2019 , the United Kingdom 's natural gas consumption peaked at 105.3 TWh . The UK has the second highest gas consumption among EU countries , with only France using more natural gas .

This statistic shows the total number of admissions for drug use disorder in England from 1st quarter 2012/13 to 1st quarter 2019/20 , by gender . In the fourth quarter of 2019/20 , the number of admissions to treatment for males stood at 14,603 . The number of females admitted to in-patient drug use disorder treatment in the same period stood at 2,235 .

As of 2018 , the statutory retirement age in the United Kingdom stood at 65 years , with an increasing number of workers expecting to retire at the age of 65 years and over . This statistic presents the statutory retirement age for employees in the UK in 2018 , by gender .

The most common reasons why respondents in Canada were using their personal computers ( PC ) or mobile devices while at work were to check or send personal emails . 52 percent of respondents used a computer or device for personal emails .
This statistic illustrates the average cost of electricity per kWh in France from 2010 to 2020 . In 2020 , the average cost for the consumption of electricity amounted to 0.25 euros per kWh .

This statistic shows the percentage of adults in the United States who were vaccinated for COVID-19 as of March 2020 , by age group . The data shows that the percentage of adults aged 65 years and older who were vaccinated against the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) increased to 38.9 percent as of March of that year .

This statistic shows the percentage of consumers in the United States who purchased a product from a company they had heard was involved in a scandal as a result of a social media post in 2019 . It was found that 14 percent of respondents stated that they would stop purchasing from a company if the social media post was negative and the company did not respond .
In the United Kingdom ( UK ) , there are approximately 2.3 million people with diabetes . The prevalence has increased from 1.4 million cases in 2002 .
This statistic shows the number of employees in the manufacture of basic metals industry in Greece from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 , the manufacture of basic metals industry had 3,438 employees .

The number of Cisco Systems employees in the Netherlands increased from 124 employees in 2018 to 233 employees as of 2019 . The number of employees of the U.S.-based company in the Netherlands was 237 in 2018 .
The statistic shows the projected price of an ounce of gold from 2010 to 2020 . The price of an ounce of gold is projected to be around 1,264 U.S. dollars in 2020 .
As of March 2022 , the most popular social media website in Italy was Facebook , with an active user penetration of 49.6 percent of the population .

In the first week , 21.6 percent of all viewers of the show were men , and 78.4 percent were women . In the second week , the number of male viewers decreased to 18 percent , and the number of female viewers increased to 82 percent .

The coronavirus epidemic in the U.S. is likely to have a negative impact on the country  s economy . The majority of respondents in a poll conducted in March 2020 estimated that the epidemic would reduce the U.S. gross domestic product by 1 percent or more .

This statistic shows the share of adults who use the Internet to access online games as a form of entertainment , according to a poll conducted in the United States in March/April 2011 . The share of adults who used the web to access online games was 50 percent .
In the first week of January 2021 , 36.8 percent of all posts on Facebook related to the coronavirus outbreak in China .

This statistic shows the share of individuals with an annual income below the national average who stated they would not take a loan in 2020 . According to the survey , 14 percent of respondents in the lowest income quintile said it was not possible to obtain a loan .
In the United Arab Emirates , the average monthly gross salary of employees in the construction sector reached approximately 12,300 dirham as of 2015 .
